programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.desc: TSN's flagship show providing news, highlights, analysis and interviews from the world of sports.

programme.desc: From Thompson-Boling Arena in Knoxville, Tenn.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: Alabama teams in the Trojans and Gamecocks meet in the state capital of Montgomery for the Salute to Veterans Bowl. Both sides fell short in their conference championship games. The schools, located some 165 miles apart, haven't engaged since 2001.

programme.title: The Cannons
programme.desc: African-American teens and their legendary hockey coach Neal Henderson overcome challenges, both on and off the ice, while playing for the Fort Dupont Cannons, one of North America's longest serving minority hockey programs.

programme.title: Beyond Their Years: The Incredible Legacies of Herb Carnegie and Buck O'Neil
programme.desc: The lives of sports and social justice icons Herb Carnegie and Buck O'Neil, who because of their race, were excluded from competing at the highest levels of their sports. Both men fought that injustice by working to make the world more inclusive.

programme.title: The Grizzlie Truth
programme.desc: Superfan filmmaker Kat Jayme investigates the abrupt move of her NBA hometown team, the Vancouver Grizzlies, to Memphis in 2001. Much more than a sore spot, it's an unsolved mystery and possibly a criminal conspiracy. The investigation becomes a love letter to the worst professional sports franchise in history and an exploration into the deep roots of fandom.

programme.desc: The AFC North-leading Steelers (7-6) host the Dolphins (6-7) on Monday Night Football. The Steelers wrested the division lead back from the Ravens with a 27-22 victory at Baltimore last week. Miami has won four straight for the first time since 2022.

programme.desc: The death of a baby leads the detectives to a smuggling operation that hides cocaine in baby formula.

programme.desc: A drug dealer dies in jail after being beaten and sexually assaulted.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Alexandra Cabot questions a pediatrician (Judd Hirsch) about a dead baby found in a cooler in the East River.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler hunts for a missing 14-year-old girl who may have been abducted by a foreign child pornographer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the apparent suicide of a 20-year-old woman who jumped from the balcony of a prominent family's home.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young boy witnesses the brutal sexual assault and murder of his mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old beauty queen's body is found in a suitcase on a Manhattan bus, detectives hunt for a pedophile with a fetish for pageants.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives believe a young Asian's assault has something to do with a rivalry between gangs, until a second victim turns up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a girl in foster care is found dead, the detectives probe her family connections in search of a motive and a murderer.

programme.title: Dateline

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Marine who had top-level security clearance, and the corpse is missing a hand.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have the gruesome task of identifying the remains of a man and woman who were stabbed in a park.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The upsetting discovery of a teenage network revolving around sex, drugs and booze raises alarms for the Stablers about their own daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Assistant DA Cabot jeopardizes the detectives' careers and her own when she exceeds legal limits to collect evidence against a serial child-abuser.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape/murder of a woman whose stepfather is a judge (Keir Dullea) known for his harsh sentencing of sex offenders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a baby's finger in a rape victim's purse, their investigation widens to encompass three generations of women harboring secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate to determine whether a 22-year-old with Down syndrome is pregnant as a result of rape, as her mother contends.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a transsexual is found murdered in a church, suspicion falls on a priest (Eric Stoltz) who resigned from a parochial school after rumors of abuse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for a suspect with an ax to grind when an engagement party ends in a quadruple homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A female party-goer claims self-defense after killing her attacker.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man (Fred Savage) accused of rape becomes a formidable opponent when he decides to handle his own defense.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A murdered 14-year-old girl leads the detectives to a prominent physician who specializes in reproduction therapy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect several young socialites of raping a girl at a Manhattan nightclub, then killing her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial rapist is the main suspect when an expectant mother is abducted during a car jacking.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate when two high-school basketball players are gunned down while shooting hoops in the gymnasium.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A psychiatrist specializing in the treatment of sex offenders is found badly beaten in a crack house and one of her recently paroled patients, the "Duct Tape Rapist," is the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives face off against a Colombian cartel and the Drug Enforcement Administration while investigating the brutal rape and murder of an undercover agent.

programme.desc: A dead newborn leads detectives to a dermatologist, then a serial pedophile.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence's investigation into a string of robberies targeting vulnerable immigrants escalates when a teenage girl connected to a critic of the CPD is kidnapped by the robbers.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess finds herself in a difficult situation when she responds to a call while a civilian is in her car for a ride-along that was requested by Brennan.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence's investigation of a nightclub owner suspected of cocaine distribution is complicated when Ruzek recognizes someone close to him while working undercover.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When the wife of an alderman is beaten to death, Voight finds himself under pressure from Brennan to close the case; Upton shares a dark episode from her past to elicit a confession.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight urges Halstead to remain impartial and follow the facts when the leader of a local mosque becomes the suspect in the bombing of an Army recruitment center.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The stakes become personal for Atwater during Intelligence's investigation of a drug dealer suspected of homicide.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As his dependency on prescription painkillers grows, Antonio crosses a line, endangering someone close to him and ultimately putting the entire team at risk.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The surprising arrival of a new fire truck brings both joy and chaos to members of Firehouse 51; Boden and Severide are asked to make peace with an old foe for the greater good; Brett receives family news while Foster plans a party with friends.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of mysterious gas leaks has members of Firehouse 51 puzzled and spread thin; Brett's conflicted when her birth mother gets serious about finding her; Severide misunderstands his role as Cruz's best man; Mouch bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of teen opioid overdoses sees Severide partner with Sean Roman, but he begins to suspect there's more to the story than his old friend is telling him; Casey tries to be there for Brett as she considers her birth mother's offer to meet.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden is on edge after starting a new fad diet; Casey and Severide disagree on a call; Brett's birth mother shares life-altering news; a familiar face has a proposition for Herrmann.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Things get personal for Casey and Gallo in the aftermath of a suburban house fire involving a mother and her young son; Herrmann campaigns for more respect; Kidd has an idea for giving back to her community.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
